title: Hy.I want my pixel to vibrate only while vibrate mode is activated(not when ring is activated). HOW?
content:
Hello,
I want my phone only to vibrate for notifications and calls when vibration is activated.
When normal ring is activated I don't want my phone to vibrate al all. Is this possible?
I have Android 11.
I searched everywhere and I could not find an answer.
Thank you!
